author: pcs
msg: Reviewed by:  Brian Behlendorf, Chuck Murcko, Roy T. Fielding
Auto-create a Makefile in the support directory: remove the old static
Makefile and add a template Makefile.tmpl which will have the configuration
information prepended onto it (by src/Configure) to make the new Makefile.

author: pcs
msg: Reviewed by:  Brian Behlendorf, Chuck Murcko, Roy T. Fielding
Auto-create a Makefile in the support directory: update Configure to
write out the configured information to Makefile.config then prepend
that to the Makefile.tmpl in both src and support.
